content.Backpack_Bought: Great! You can hold up to {0} items now!
content.About_Credit:
= Created by ConcernedApe
< Published by Chucklefish
= Ported by Sickhead Games
< Localized by Playism & LocalizeDirect
content.About_CreditExtra_Console:

content.Carpenter_CantDemolish_AnimalsHere: Can't demolish until animals are relocated
content.Carpenter_CantDemolish_PlayerHere: Can't demolish while a player is in here
content.Character_CoopHelpString: Starting Cabins: Start with 1-3 cabins already in place, allowing your friends to join immediately. Alternatively, you can select "None" and build the cabins yourself (via Robin).^^Cabin Layout: If you decide to start your farm with pre-existing cabins, you can choose between two layout styles: "Nearby" places all cabins near the main farmhouse, encouraging a communal farming style. "Separate" places the cabins far apart, allowing more room for independence.^^Profit Margin: Adjusts the profit margin (money you earn) on goods you sell. 'Normal' is the original Stardew Valley experience. More experienced and/or larger groups may wish to decrease the margin.
content.Character_CoopHelpString2: Money Style: You can choose how money is earned and spent. In "Shared" mode, all players share the same pool of money. In "Separate" mode, each player has their own, individual pool of money. "Shared" is the classic Stardew Valley experience.
content.Character_FarmStandard: Standard Farm_A simple plot of land, with a large amount of open space to design your farm.
content.Character_FarmForaging: Forest Farm_The woods limit your farming space. However, the bounty of the forest is nearly at your doorstep...
content.Character_FarmFishing: Riverland Farm_Your farm is spread across several islands and scenic riverbanks. Fish are more common here than usual.
content.Character_FarmMining: Hill-top Farm_Rocky terrain and a winding river make it difficult to design your farm. However, a mineral deposit provides mining opportunities.
content.Character_FarmCombat: Wilderness Farm_There's plenty of good land here, but beware... at night the monsters come out.
content.Character_FarmFourCorners: Four Corners Farm_The land is divided into four parcels, each with its own perk. Perfect for a group!
content.GeodeMenu_InventoryFull: You don't have enough room in your inventory.
content.GeodeMenu_Description_NotEnoughMoney:
The price is 25g per geode...

It looks you can't afford it right now.
content.GeodeMenu_Description:
Just place your geodes on my anvil and I'll give them a whack.

The price is 25g per geode.
content.JojaCDMenu_Hover0: Repairs the bus that runs to Calico Desert.
content.JojaCDMenu_Hover1: Repairs the minecart system that runs between the bus stop, the mountains, and Pelican Town.
content.JojaCDMenu_Hover2: Repairs the broken bridge in the mountains.
content.JojaCDMenu_Hover3: Repairs the old ruins on the farm, turning it into a greenhouse.
content.JojaCDMenu_Hover4: Removes the glimmering boulder near the mine entrance.
content.JunimoNote_MustBeAtCC: Must be deposited at Community Center
content.JunimoNote_MustBeAtAJM: Must be deposited at Abandoned JojaMart
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Coopmaster:
Befriend coop animals quicker.
Incubation time cut in half.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Shepherd:
Befriend barn animals quicker.
Sheep produce wool faster.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Artisan: Artisan goods (wine, cheese, oil, etc.) worth 40% more.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Trapper: Resources required to craft crab pots reduced.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Mariner: Crab pots no longer produce junk items.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Luremaster: Crab pots no longer require bait.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Gatherer: Chance for double harvest of foraged items.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Lumberjack: All trees have a chance to drop hardwood.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Botanist: Foraged items are always highest quality.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Geologist: Chance for gems to appear in pairs.
content.LevelUp_ProfessionDescription_Acrobat: Cooldown on special moves cut in half.
content.TooManyFarmsMenu_TooManyFarms: You already have the maximum number of farms.

content.Chat_Qi2: Mr. Qi: Hey... keep up the good work, and never stop striving for success!      I'll see you soon, kid...
content.Chat_ConcernedApe: ConcernedApe: Hello. I hope you're enjoying your new life here. Take care! [126]

content.AGO_CCB_Tooltip: Modifies the bundles that appear in the Community Center.

content.AGO_FarmMonsters_Tooltip: Allows monsters to spawn at night.

content.AGO_RandomSeed_Tooltip: The seed used to randomize the game world.

content.Character_FarmBeach: Beach Farm_Good foraging and fishing, and tons of open space. Sometimes, supply crates wash up on shore. However, sprinklers don't work in the sandy soil.
content.Forge_description1: Place weapon or tool in the left slot. Place gemstone in the right slot.

content.Chat_Eternal1: You feel it in your heart: somewhere, somehow... Grandpa is beaming with pride.
content.Chat_Eternal2: The legacy of {0} Farm is eternal.
content.Chat_Eternal3: A rumbling sound was heard in the distance...
content.NameChange_EasterEgg1: ConcernedApe: What kind of a name is that? Seems fishy...
content.NameChange_EasterEgg2: Mr. Qi: Easy {0}, huh? I'm disappointed, kid. I thought you wanted to beat this game fair and square?
content.NameChange_EasterEgg3: *Grandpa is shaking his head... 'I built this farm the old fashioned way, not with unlimited {0}...'
content.NameChange_EasterEgg4: ConcernedApe is mad that you're cheating...
content.NameChange_EasterEgg5: ConcernedApe: I'm not actually mad... have fun.
content.NameChange_EasterEgg6: Calling all cars! Calling all cars! We've got {0} {1} thief on the loose!
content.AGO_Farmhouse_Tooltip: Your farmhouse will be placed in a different spot on the farm.
content.AGO_EasyMode_Tooltip: Makes some aspects of the game easier, and reduces penalties.
content.DisplayAdjustmentText: Press up/down to adjust the screen size to fit your display.
